snippet: The Pirate Party has built its success on little more than a vague platform of greater openness in government, using technology.
abstract: Germany's young Pirate Party garners 8.2 percent of the electorate in Schleswig-Holstein, entering its third regional legislature and solidifying its presence as an upstart in Germany's political landscape; party advocates greater government openness.
lead_paragraph: The Pirate Party has built its success on little more than a vague platform of greater openness in government, using technology.

headline.seo: Upstart Pirate Party Continues to Hijack Votes in Germany
headline.main: Upstarts Continue to Hijack Votes in Germany
headline.print_headline: Unlikely Surge of Upstart Pirate Party Complicates German Political Landscape
